title: LV999 Villager - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Demon Lord   Demons   Game Elements   Gods   Heroes   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Hunters   Kingdoms   Level System   Loli   Male Protagonist   Merchants   Monsters   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Saving the World   Sword And Magic   Thieves   Wizards
author: Hoshitsuki kitten   Hoshitsuki Koneko   星月子猫
description:
He lost his father to monsters thus he wanted to eradicate all monsters.

He lost his mother to Humans thus he wanted to destroy the world.

In his pursuit of destruction of the world he had discovered the truth.

Now his journey begins anew to beat the ones behind the world system after helping a little girl, the demon king’s daughter.>
